content:
Angela Dodson: I don't believe in the Devil. 
 John Constantine: You should. He believes in you.
Selene: For those like me, a Death Dealer, this signaled the end of an era. Like the weapons of the previous century, we too would become obsolete. Pity, because I lived for it!
Rorschach: No. Not even in the face of Armageddon. Never compromise.
Trinity: I know why you're here, Neo. I know what you've been doing... why you hardly sleep, why you live alone, and why night after night, you sit by your computer.
